summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 189 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 907 m), rainfall (down 0.1 mm), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 189.2m lower than yesterday, 29.8m lower than the past week, 906.6m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 745m to a maximum of 3580m, averaging 1797.2m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1827.0m and 2700m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Some rain can be expected, clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
